# API Surface: cli

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| CLI Commands | CLI | Commander.js-based CLI with init, status, resume, abandon, archive commands and slash commands | src/cli/commands/ |
| GitHub Issues API | REST | Octokit-based integration for importing/syncing GitHub issues | src/importers/github-importer.ts |
| JIRA REST API v3 | REST | JQL-based issue querying, sprint management, epic linking | src/integrations/jira/jira-client.ts |
| Azure DevOps REST API | REST | Work item management with WIQL queries, area paths, iterations | src/integrations/ado/ado-client.ts |
| LLM Provider Factory | Abstraction | Multi-provider LLM integration (Claude Code, Anthropic, OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Ollama, Bedrock, Vertex AI) | src/core/llm/provider-factory.ts |
